@StevieGrainger @colmmcauliffe @TheDonOMahony... For Van the Man. We were totally pissed off.

@TheDonOMahony @colmmcauliffe Mick needs to write it down - if only so I can read it! I swear I was in tears for hours listening to him.
@colmmcauliffe @TheDonOMahony That's it, that whole story is worthy of a book!! Funniest stories I ever heard, looking for an ATM in Belarus
@colmmcauliffe @TheDonOMahony NoMeansNo applauded them, thought they were legends. Drove 72plus hours to support them. Don't know band name.
@colmmcauliffe @TheDonOMahony It was the band that came after Shanks. They made it back to Cork for NoMeansNo gig, pushed van up Barrack St
@colmmcauliffe @TheDonOMahony Mick Hayes once spend a whole evening telling me about a tour they did in Russia, funniest evening ever!
@colmmcauliffe @TheDonOMahony no, but Barlow wrote about it on a tour diary in his blog. Shanks, my heroes after that! Barlow was stunned.
